column4: so this is an interesting issue that i have... my company just had me set up a few comps for customer service reps.... they wanted to save money on the licences. so i said lets use ubuntu... everything works great except..... 1 website... this 1 website only works on IE.. even on a windows machine
what in the world can i do to get this to work
WHat website? Have you tried changing the user agent string? How exactly does it fail?
